Title: Laura Karlson to Alma C. Wilson 1948.12.19
Description: LETTER FROM LAURA KARLSON DATED DECEMBER 19 – 1948, TO FRU (MRS.) ALMA VILSON, 102 WEST 5 ST., DELL RAPIDS, SO DAK., U.S.A.  ON THE ENVELOPE THERE'S A GREEN DECLARATION OF CONTENT WHICH SAYS THERE'S A HANDKERCHIEF ENCLOSED, WEIGHING 11 GRAMS AND WITH A VALUE OF 50 ØRE (IN THOSE DAYS THE DOLLAR WAS WORTH ABOUT 5 KRONER, 100 ØRE TO 1 KRONE).  THE STAMPS HAVE BEEN REMOVED, SENT BY AIR.
Creator: Laura Karlson
Siri Lawson, trans.
